content: Hello, does anyone have anything good or bad to say about Vonk?

As the training coordinator for Firely I won't comment on the subject of your question, but you may wish to request that those that have experience with Vonk contact you in a 'private message' using this chat forum. The FHIR community tries to keep this chat forum as 'neutral' as possible. The #dotnet forum may also be a useful source of information.
